# The `CallLoweringInfo` Struct Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This structure contains all information that is necessary for lowering calls. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

This structure contains all information that is necessary for lowering calls.

It is passed to TLI::LowerCallTo when the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondag">SelectionDAG</a> builder needs to lower a call, and targets will see this struct in their LowerCall implementation.

Definition at line 4529 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/targetlowering-h">TargetLowering.h</a>.
